<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Ode to Ouroboros](/Spells.aspx?ID=1771)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 371 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** A creature’s dying condition would reach the value at which they would die

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** the triggering creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your ode staves off death. The target's [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition remains 1 below the value at which it dies. This doesn't help prevent death from effects that kill the target without increasing its dying condition, such as [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) and [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects.
name: Ode to Ouroboros
